title: Miley Jab Hum Tum reunion: Arjun Bijlani meets co-actors Sanaya Irani and Mohit Sehgal
text: Alia-Varun to promote 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania' in KJo's chat show? Miley Jab Hum Tum reunion: Arjun Bijlani meets co-actors Sanaya Irani and Mohit Sehgal Actor Arjun Bijlani, who is currently seen on the show Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil, had a reunion with his 'Miley Jab Hum Tum' cast Sanaya Irani and her husband Mohit Sehgal. TNN | Updated: Feb 5, 2017, 04.56 PM IST Actor Arjun Bijlani , who is currently seen on the show Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil, had a reunion with his 'Miley Jab Hum Tum' cast Sanaya Irani and her husband Mohit Sehgal. Arjun posted a groupfie of them in a single frame on Twitter and wrote, "About last night #mileyjabhumtum." — Arjun Bijlani (@Thearjunbijlani) February 5, 2017 The trio was present at the venue, but we didn't see Rati Pandey anywhere is the picture, guess she gave the reunion party a miss. READ ALSO: Arjun Bijlani takes gym to the set Sanaya Irani, who played the role of Gunjan Bhushan Shergill got married to her co -actor Samrat Shergill aka Mohit Sehgal in 2016. She was to make her comeback with the show Meenu Mausi, which got scrapped later, and fans are still waiting for her to make an appearance on small screen. Arjun was last seen on the supernatural show Naagin, and is currently seen romancing Drashti Dhami in Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil. WATCH: Arjun Bijlani Posted The Sweetest Anniversary Wish For His Wife ! Aww ! Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device. RELATED
